text: United Tribal Nationalist Liberation Front, a regional political party in Assam, India. UTNLF was launched by the PTCA (Progressive) (splinter group of Plain Tribals Council of Assam) in 1984. UTNLF demands statehood for the Bodo areas. The UTNLF led a violent campaign during the 1990s against both the Assamese and the Indian military units in the area. Category:Political parties in Assam Category:Political schisms Category:Political parties in India
title: United Tribal Nationalist Liberation Front
